Description: Fragmnet of olval handle from neck join to sharp turn of a Rhodian pottery transport amphora. Clay fine buff-brown; cream slip. Rectangular stamp.
Curator's comments: Name Marsyas. From the same die as Alexandria, Greco-Roman Museum, ABC 0685.17.
Bibliographic references: Stoddart 1847 / Memoir on the inscribed pottery of Rhodes, Cnidus and other Greek Cities (180)
